rules: holds(S, sum_output(N), Z) :- holds(S, digit, digit_input(1,N), X), holds(S, digit, digit_input(2,N), Y), holds(S, carry, N, C), Z=(X+Y+C) \ 10.
holds(S, carry, N+1, C1) :- N > 0, holds(S, digit, digit_input(1,N), X), holds(S, digit, digit_input(2,N), Y), holds(S, carry, N, C2), C1=(X+Y+C2) / 10.
holds(S, sum_output(2), Z) :- holds(S, carry, 2, Z).
